definition[0]: the activity of buying and selling goods or services
note[0]: Sunday trading British English (=shops being open on Sunday)
definition[1]: the activity of buying and selling stocks etc
definition[2]: the activity of operating as a business and buying and selling goods and services
example[1]: national policy on industry, energy, and trading
example[2]: Prices are set by the market and reflect international trading conditions.
